summary: An ordinance providing for the construction of a trunk sewer and subsewers, along Michigan Street, from Duwamish Waterway to Corson Avenue, and along certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, and the construction or branch or lateral sewers along certain streets and avenues; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7819, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for sid improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds"; adopting the maps, plans and specifications for such improvement, and declaring an emergency.
